lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Teddy Geiger/Danny Parker/Daniel Kyriakides
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Teddy Geiger/Danny Parker/Daniel Kyriakides
[00:06.64]I thought that I've been hurt before
[00:12.29]But no one's ever left me quite this sore
[00:19.31]Your words cut deeper than a knife
[00:24.89]Now I need someone to breathe me back to life
[00:32.25]Got a feeling that I'm going under
[00:35.49]But I know that I'll make it out alive
[00:38.70]If I quit calling you my lover
[00:41.88]Move on
[00:43.41]You watch me bleed until I can't breathe shaking
[00:47.86]Falling onto my knees
[00:50.12]And now that I'm without your kisses
[00:54.32]I'll be needing stitches
[00:57.54]Tripping over myself aching
[01:00.72]Begging you to come help
[01:02.36]
[01:02.96]And now that I'm without your kisses
[01:07.00]I'll be needing stitches
[01:09.98]
[01:10.83]Just like a moth drawn to a flame
[01:14.41]
[01:16.11]Oh you lured me in I couldn't sense the pain
[01:20.70]
[01:23.51]Your bitter heart cold to the touch
[01:27.33]
[01:28.61]Now I'm gonna reap what I sow
[01:31.05]
[01:31.62]I'm left seeing red on my own
[01:34.66]
[01:36.22]Got a feeling that I'm going under
[01:39.50]But I know that I'll make it out alive
[01:42.74]If I quit calling you my lover
[01:45.88]Move on
[01:47.46]You watch me bleed until I can't breathe shaking
[01:51.93]Falling onto my knees
[01:53.61]
[01:54.13]And now that I'm without your kisses
[01:58.36]I'll be needing stitches
[02:01.58]Tripping over myself aching
[02:04.74]Begging you to come help
[02:06.40]
[02:06.98]And now that I'm without your kisses
[02:11.03]I'll be needing stitches
[02:14.02]
[02:20.86]Needle and the thread
[02:21.98]Gotta get you out of my head
[02:23.95]Needle and the thread
[02:25.15]Gonna wind up dead
[02:27.10]Needle and the thread
[02:28.32]Gotta get you out of my head
[02:30.33]Needle and the thread
[02:31.54]Gonna wind up dead
[02:33.54]Needle and the thread
[02:34.70]Gotta get you out of my head

[02:37.94]Gonna wind up dead
[02:39.93]Needle and the thread
[02:41.10]Gotta get you out of my head get you out of my head
[02:45.12]You watch me bleed until I can't breathe shaking

[03:02.38]Begging you to come help
[03:04.48]And now that I'm without your kisses

tlyric:
[by:小兔zer]
[00:06.64]我自认也曾受伤心碎
[00:12.29]但从未有人让我陷入如此痛苦
[00:19.31]你言语如刀 劚玉如泥
[00:24.89]而今 我需要抢救回生
[00:32.25]就像是跌入无底深渊
[00:35.49]但我却知道我终将生还
[00:38.70]如果我不再唤你作爱人
[00:41.88]请向前看
[00:43.41]你眼睁睁看我失血而亡
[00:47.86]颤抖着跪倒在地
[00:50.12]如今我已不再有你的吻相伴
[00:54.32]我需要缝合我的伤口
[00:57.54]被自己绊倒
[01:00.72]痛苦地央求你来帮我
[01:02.96]而今我已不再有你的吻相伴
[01:07.00]我需要缝合我的伤口
[01:10.83]如同飞蛾扑火般
[01:16.11]我被你迷惑，不曾看见暗流涌动
[01:23.51]你心如石木 难撼半毫
[01:28.61]如今我要将爱收回
[01:31.62]把悲痛留给自己
[01:36.22]就像是跌入无底深渊
[01:39.50]但我却知道我终将生还
[01:42.74]如果我不再唤你作爱人
[01:45.88]请向前看
[01:47.46]你眼睁睁看我失血而亡
[01:51.93]颤抖着跪倒在地
[01:54.13]如今我已不再有你的吻相伴
[01:58.36]我需要缝合我的伤口
[02:01.58]被自己绊倒
[02:04.74]痛苦地央求你来帮我
[02:06.98]而今我已不再有你的吻相伴
[02:11.03]我需要缝合我的伤口
[02:20.86]一针又一线
[02:21.98]将你赶出我脑海
[02:23.95]一针又一线
[02:25.15]死而又复生
[02:27.10]一针又一线
[02:28.32]将你赶出我脑海
